taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species rotundior;

treatment.description: Similar to no. 121 but nearly glandless; terminal primocane-leaflet round-ovate, abruptly tipped; floricane-leaflets broadly obovate, strongly rounded at summit; axis of inflorescences and pedicels with few or no setae.
